page.title: 19RELIGION IN NETTLEHAM
page.content: Some 10% of the population attend Nettleham's 2 Christian Churches each Sunday.The Anglican Parish church,All Saints,gives hospitality to local Roman Catholics for their Sunday Mass, while the Methodist Church also flourishes.Christians of other traditions have their churches in Lincoln.More than ten Christians house group are at work,growing in membership & in faith.Anglicans & Methodists,in particular,are lerning at work together.There is a strong Christian influence in the Junior School,which is Church of England (aided).Christians are achive within Nettleham;in groups based on their churches;in village organisations especially for young people & for their neighbours.This is 1 factor in maintaining Nettlehams reputation as a friendly,caring community
